subject: Re: A 40 second segment 23-session1
author: Frank
full_text:
I heard the entire message to include your name Frank. I recently got
one of these also. I also got a recent wake-up message too. That was
interesting. LOL

Frank R.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
>
> Yes I think so too. I hear your name at the beginning of that file
pretty clear.
>    
>   Misty
> 
> Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
>           I think linear sweep works just as well as the random mode
i had been using 
> all these years. Once again anohter theory bites the dust! I thought
it had 
> to be random, and that was the assumption I was working from the
past five 
> years. So all I can say for sure is that if we supply an audio
source that 
> the spirits/entities can make a voice out of, they will. They use
what we 
> use, and I don't it matters alot what you use, there is no one
system, or 
> method,..... no right, or correct way.
> 
> I avve to ask, -----if no one is is listening do the spirits still
speak?
> 
> Frank--late for work agian!!
